name: World Bender
description:
World Bender is a game where you walk between worlds to solve the puzzles before you. Make use of converters to swap your worlds around and eventually take the control into your own hands.

This game is a very very early prototype idea that I made in less than 5 hours so don't expect anything good, I'd love to get your feedback tho.

Controls:

WASD - Move

LMB - Interact/Pickup

RMB - Switch (once you have the switcher)

SPACE - Jump
